title: Tales of the Abyss: Senketsu no Asch
original_name: テイルズ オブ ジ アビス 鮮血のアッシュ
sinopse: Senketsu no Asch follows the same story as the anime, but from the perspective of the "God General" Asch instead. Thus, it reveals a lot of information missing from the anime, as well as giving some insight into the other God Generals as they interact with Asch.
